name: Simon's Sewers
description:
Venture into the sewers where the creatures plays Simon says.

Get as much gold as you can.

HOW TO PLAY:

when the enemy reveals the attack color. Respond with the same color for most enemies. <z>: Dark  <C>Light

CONTROLS:

INCOMBAT:

<Z> Dark attack.  <C> Light Attack

WALKING: 

<UP> go into room ahead. <Left> turn into left room. <Right> turn into right room

<DOWN>Go into room behind    <C> Menu.    <Z>Use a Potion 

<X> interact/ pickup/ use Ladders

MENU:

<X> Increase Stat  <Z> Exit <UP/DOWN> navigate

ENEMIES

Enemies Speed, Attack power and Like increases the deeper down you go.

:Slimes are just regular enemies.

:Bats have Dark and Light signals are switched around. Still match with same color.

: Snakes will show both Dark and Light until they are ready to strike.

:Rats are liars and will show the OPPOSITE color.

STATS

HP: Increases life           DMG: Increases damage to enemies

SPD: Gives more time to react          LCK: affects various things(dodging, item drops,                                                                                                               chance for potion to heal all life, xp)

XP: shows current experience points you have (above value) and points needed to increase a stat(below value)
